channel.title: ethylene production on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ethylene production on funPlantGenes

item.title: ACS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_215s0046g02220 Gene Symbol: ACS1 Gene Name: Genome: genome assembly 12X.

item.title: AdMsrB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc04318 Gene Symbol: AdMsrB1 Gene Name: Genome: Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: AdMsrB1 is a novel ethylene-regulated gene expressed in ripening kiwifruit.

item.title: AdNAC72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Acc13705 Gene Symbol: AdNAC72 Gene Name: Genome: Genome_version:Actinidia chinensis (Red5) Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: Upregulation of AdMsrB1 in response to ethylene requires TFs AdNAC2 and AdNAC72.

item.title: CitACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla011230 Gene Symbol: CitACS4 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 4 Genome: watermelon genome() Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Mutation in the gene encoding 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 4 (CitACS4) led to andromonoecy in watermelon.

item.title: Cm-ERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Lotus japonicus with an Ethylene Receptor Gene Cm-ERS1/H70A Enhances Formation of Infection Threads and Nodule Primordia.

item.title: Cm-ETR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ETR1 Gene Name: ethylene receptor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In fully enlarged fruit the level of Cm-ERS1 mRNA was low in all tissues, whereas that of Cm-ETR1 mRNA was very high in the seeds and placenta.

item.title: CmACS7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmACS7 Gene Name: Genome: Melon (Charmono) v1.

item.title: CmMYB44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C016789 Gene Symbol: CmMYB44 Gene Name: MYB44 transcription factor Genome: Melon (DHL92) v3.

item.title: CsEIL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_6G004610 Gene Symbol: CsEIL3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A CsEIL3-CsARN6.

item.title: ERF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD03G1231800 Gene Symbol: ERF4 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: GhERF-IIb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhERF-IIb3 Gene Name: cultivar Reba B50 ethylene-responsive transcription factor-IIb3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhERF-IIb3 regulates the accumulation of jasmonate and leads to enhanced cotton resistance to blight diseas.

item.title: LeACS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g095080.3.1 Gene Symbol: LeACS2 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate synthase 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Turnover of LeACS2, a wound-inducible 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid synthase in tomato, is regulated by phosphorylation/dephosphorylation.

item.title: LeERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeERF2 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional Regulation of the Ethylene Response Factor LeERF2 in the Expression of Ethylene Biosynthesis Genes Controls Ethylene Production in Tomato and Tobacco.

item.title: MaACO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma07_t19730.1 Gene Symbol: MaACO1 Gene Name: aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate oxidase 1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: CRISPR/Cas9-mediated genome editing of MaACO1 (aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate oxidase 1) promotes the shelf life of banana fruit.

item.title: MaBEL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma01_g01710 Gene Symbol: MaBEL1 Gene Name: BEL1-LIKE HOMEODOMAIN transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MaBEL1 regulates banana fruit ripening by activating cell wall and starch degradation-related genes.

item.title: MaMADS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaMADS1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MaMADS1–MaNAC083 transcriptional regulatory cascade regulates ethylene biosynthesis during banana fruit ripening.

item.title: MaNAC083
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma10_g12120 Gene Symbol: MaNAC083 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MaMADS1–MaNAC083 transcriptional regulatory cascade regulates ethylene biosynthesis during banana fruit ripening.

item.title: MdACS6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000133334 Gene Symbol: MdACS6 Gene Name: ACC synthase6 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdACS6 Regulates Ethylene Biosynthesis During Fruit Development Involving Ethylene-Responsive Factor.

item.title: MdMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000029168 Gene Symbol: MdMYC2 Gene Name: Jasmonate-Activated Transcription Factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdMYC2 is a homology of Arabidopsis MYC2 in apple, it has highly similarity in structure and function to the Arabidopsis MYC2.

item.title: PhACO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhACO1 Gene Name: 1-aminocyclopropane-1-carboxylate oxidase1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: PhACO1 was subsequently edited using the CRISPR/Cas9 system, and its role in ethylene production was investigated.

item.title: PhBPBT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhBPBT Gene Name: benzoyl CoA:benzyl alcohol/phenylethanol benzoyltransferase Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Tissue-specific PhBPBT expression is differentially regulated in response to endogenous ethylene.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Peaxi162Scf00285g00011 Gene Symbol: PhOBF1 Gene Name: Genome: Sol Genomics Network (https://solgenomics.

item.title: PuWRKY31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuWRKY31 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 31 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: The expression of the transcription factor PuWRKY31 was higher in BNG fruit than in NG fruit, and was induced by sucrose treatment.

item.title: ScFBH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ScFBH1 Gene Name: flowering BHLH 1 Genome: Species: Saccharum officinarum Functional Descriptions: Protein–protein interaction assays showed that sugarcane FBH1 (ScFBH1), ScFBH2, and ScFBH3 form homo- and heterodimers in the nucleus.

item.title: ScFBH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ScFBH2 Gene Name: flowering BHLH 2 Genome: Species: Saccharum officinarum Functional Descriptions: Protein–protein interaction assays showed that sugarcane FBH1 (ScFBH1), ScFBH2, and ScFBH3 form homo- and heterodimers in the nucleus.

item.title: ScFBH3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ScFBH3 Gene Name: flowering BHLH 3 Genome: Species: Saccharum officinarum Functional Descriptions: Protein–protein interaction assays showed that sugarcane FBH1 (ScFBH1), ScFBH2, and ScFBH3 form homo- and heterodimers in the nucleus.

item.title: SlbHLH22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g097820 Gene Symbol: SlbHLH22 Gene Name: basic helix-loop-helix 12 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a basic helix–loop–helix transcription factor gene, SlbHLH22, promotes early flowering and accelerates fruit ripening in tomato.

item.title: SlCYP90B3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g085360 Gene Symbol: SlCYP90B3 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlE8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g089580 Gene Symbol: SlE8|Sl27DOX Gene Name: C-27 hydroxylase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Induced mutations in SlE8|Sl27DOX and SlACO1 control tomato fruit maturation and shelf-life.

item.title: SlFERL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g015830 Gene Symbol: SlFERL Gene Name: FERONIA Like Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlFERL Interacts with S-Adenosylmethionine Synthetase to Regulate Fruit Ripening.

item.title: SlMADS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlMADS1 Gene Name: MADS-Box Transcription Factor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A Tomato MADS-Box Transcription Factor, SlMADS1, Acts as a Negative Regulator of Fruit Ripening.

item.title: SlRLK-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g094920.2 Gene Symbol: SlRLK-like Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlRLK-like is a malectin-like domain protein affecting localization and abundance of LeEIX2 receptor resulting in suppression of EIX-induced immune responses.

item.title: SmERF73
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmERF73 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 73 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: The ERF-VII transcription factor SmERF73 coordinately regulates tanshinone biosynthesis in response to stress elicitors in Salvia miltiorrhiza.
